description: Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to carry out development without compliance with Condition 1 (Approved drawings/details) for Application Reference Number: 21/03876/FUL (Mixed use development including retention of 127 Chiltern Drive, demolition of all other buildings and erection of 2no. buildings for flexible commercial floorspace at ground floor and 43 no residential units on upper floors, with associated access, landscaping, car parking, cycle parking and refuse storage.) dated 05.05.2023. Variation to amend the approved drawings and a deed of variation to the associated s106 agreement to provide a payment in lieu of on-site affordable housing provision.
site_name: 127 Chiltern Drive And Chiltern WorksSurbitonKT5 8LS
